description: Use Java Collections Framework to solve practical problems.

description: Practice basic Python syntax, variables, and data types.

description: Quiz covering lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets in Python.

description: Create a Python program that reads and writes files efficiently.

description: Practice variables, functions, and control flow in JavaScript.

description: Quiz on selecting and manipulating DOM elements.

description: Build a responsive website that works on multiple devices.

title: Database Design Project

description: Quiz on database normalization and reducing data redundancy.

title: Database Schema Project
description: Design and implement a relational database schema with tables and relationships.
